events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
Customer issue identified as refund request due to receiving the wrong item.
Assigning this refund case to agent Sarah K. for handling and further follow-up.
Hello! I'm Sarah, and I understand you want a refund because you received the wrong item. Let's get this sorted out quickly.
Could you please provide the order number and a photo of the item you received so we can verify the issue?
Sure, my order number is 4583921. I've attached a photo showing the item that was delivered instead of what I ordered.
Thank you for the details. I have approved your refund, which will be processed to your original payment method within 5-7 business days.
Thank you for the quick response and help. I appreciate the smooth refund process and the clear instructions.
Your refund request has been successfully resolved, and you should see the funds returned soon. Please reach out if you need further assistance.
Just following up to ensure that your refund was received and if there is anything else we can assist you with today.
Since we have not heard back and your refund should be processed, we are closing this case. Thank you for contacting support.
We have sent a satisfaction survey to your email to learn about your support experience with the refund process.
